resources.string:
DroidSteal comes with absolutely no warranty.

You use this software on your own risk.
The developer is not responsible for any damages caused by DroidSteal or its usage.
It is only the users responsibility to check his countrys laws in order to make sure that the usage of DroidSteal is permitted by law in his country. In some countries stealing someones identity might be prohibited by law.

Always think about what you are doing! Stealing someones identity can cause real trouble! So basically I am not responsible and cannot be held accountable for how YOU choose to use this tool.

YOUR PHONE SEEMS NOT TO BE ROOTED\n\nDroidSteal can only run on phones having superuser access enabled. So if the phone is not rooted and DroidSteal does not work properly, please do not ask for support! Nevertheless, DroidSteal will start for compatibility reasons
I understand and accept the disclaimer
Wifi connection lost or changed. Stopped Listening!
Busybox should be installed in order to run DroidSteal properly. Do you want to install BusyBox from market?
Do you really want to delete all hosts from blacklist?
You must accept this disclaimer in order to use DroidSteal!
Do you really want to exit DroidSteal? If you want to keep it running in background press HOME button!

This will start a debug session. It will start Listening and collect debug information. Let DroidSteal keep listening for some seconds (at least 30) and press "stop". An email will open which contains all debug information. No data will be sent silently!\n\n Email this data to "Zbob75x@gmail.com" for support and help!
There is an update available!\nActually there is no automatic update mechanism, but you can uninstall DroidSteal and pester him to get the new version manually .\nChanges:
choose custom URL to load with hijacked cookies
